subject: Re: software speach in gentoo

On Wed, May 30, 2007 at 06:38:24PM -0600, Jeremy wrote:
> Hello list. I know that you can use speakup in gentoo with a external 
> synth, but, is there support using software speach? Guess it's really 
> not needed as you can do most of it through ssh, but, figured I would 
> ask. I did a search on google for software speach in gentoo and only 
> found things from a few years ago. Either I did not search enough, 
> or, it was not there. Any ideas would be great.

Hi Geremy,

The latest version of speechd-up in gentoo is set up to handle this and
could use some testing.  To get it, do the following:

echo app-accessibility/speechd-up >> /etc/portage/package.keywords
emerge speechd-up

Then add speechd-up to the default runlevel.

Please report bugs to http://bugs.gentoo.org.

Thanks,

- -- 
William Hubbs
gentoo accessibility team lead
williamh@gentoo.org
